<title>Wills and power of attorney - Parkway Consulting</title>
<meta name="description" content="Having an an up to date will is so important. A Will gives you control on what should happen to your estate when you die. Without one the rules of intestacy determine how your estate will be distributed." />

yoast_head_json.description: Having an an up to date will is so important. A Will gives you control on what should happen to your estate when you die. Without one the rules of intestacy determine how your estate will be distributed.
